subject: Order #SSN3583
description_text:
I am contacting you regarding my order *#SSN3583*. It has been *10 days*
since I placed the order, and so far I have only received the initial order
confirmation without any further updates on processing or shipping.

I would also like to mention that I paid extra for *express shipping*, so I
expected my order to be processed and delivered sooner.

Could you please provide me with an update on the current status of my
order?

Thank you for your assistance.
Kind regards,
Tomas Kopecky

conversations.body_text: Hi Tomáš Kopecký,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the logistics delay. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with restocking expected to be completed by the 28th. At that time, we will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees.

That's great, thank you very much.

Dne čt 27. 11. 2025 11:49 uživatel service@simsonn.com
